SUMMARY: REQUIRED | OPTIONAL DETAIL: ELEMENT

com.odiago.common.flags
Annotation Type Flag

@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=FIELD)
public @interface Flag

Annotates fields that should be assigned to when a command-line is parsed.

Optional Element Summary
 String envVar
          An environment variable to use as the default value.
 boolean hidden
          Whether the flag should be displayed when --help is provided.
 String name
          The name of the flag.
 String usage
          The human-readable usage string.
 

name

public abstract String name
The name of the flag.

Default:
""

usage

public abstract String usage
The human-readable usage string.

Default:
""

hidden

public abstract boolean hidden
Whether the flag should be displayed when --help is provided.

Default:
false

envVar

public abstract String envVar
An environment variable to use as the default value.

Default:
""
